    • setup

      @BeforeEach public void setup() throws RemoteException, InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
      Setup method for all tests
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of a remote method call goes wrong
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if the number of players int given is invalid
